text: The Battle of Mactan was fought in the Philippines on April 27, 1521. It was the first time the Filipino people fought back against the Spanish invaders led by Ferdinand Magellan. Led by the chief Lapu-Lapu, they attacked the Spanish at Punta Engano on the northeast corner of Mactan Island. Lapu-Lapu's war chief was Bugto Pasa. Magellan was killed by Lapu Lapu in the battle. ==References== Category:History of the Philippines Mactan Category:1521 Category:16th century in Spain Category:1520s in Europe
title: Battle of Mactan
